Detailed Description

A set of "parallel cones" (i.e. cones with the same axis and opening angles but different apexes)

EGS_ParallelCones models a set of cones all having the same axis and opening angle but different cone apex position along the cone axis.

Parallel cones

This type of geometry is useful, for instance, for modeling the tip of an ionization chamber. It is defined via the following set of keys 


library = egs_cones
type = EGS_ParallelCones
apex                    = Ox, Oy, Oz     # Position of one cone apex
axis                    = ax, ay, az     # the cone axis
opening angle           = angle in degrees
or
opening angle in radian = angle in radians
apex distances          = list of distances from the apex
